raw_body: A beloved figure cherished by many, peacefully passed away on February 28, 2024. She was the devoted wife of the late Arthur Vethakan and the loving mother of the late Rajkumar, Rajam, Winston and Winicia, she was a mother-in-law to Manjula, Jerome, Rukshana and Derrick, Helen’s influence extended beyond her immediate family, as she was an active part of her grandchildren’s lives during their formative years, she was loved by Prashan, Jeggan, Raj
